name: Molecular Warfare (itch)
description:
Molecular Warfare is a top-down shooter with beautiful graphics. In the game you have to play as a military man and fight a squad of terrorists who have captured cities. You will have to complete different tasks on different maps.

vk: https://vk.com/zg_studio 
youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCy2i4gI4lcGynCDmPBCn8_w
